column1: Targon was a man of Gondor during the War of the Ring.
Targon worked at the storehouse and buttery for the Guards of the Citadel in Minas Tirith. On the morning of 9 March
column2: he gave Beregond and Peregrin Took food and drink for a picnic.

column1: 2001-2007: The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game:
:A Decipher card identifies one of the Gondorians riding with Faramir in The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King as Targon.
